ch.usi.dag.disl.processorcontext

Interface ArgumentProcessorContext


  • public interface ArgumentProcessorContext

    Allows accessing method arguments and applying argument processors.

    • apply(Class, ArgumentProcessorMode)
    • getReceiver(ArgumentProcessorMode)
    • getArgs(ArgumentProcessorMode)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(java.lang.Class<?> argumentProcessorClass, ArgumentProcessorMode mode)
      Applies given argument processor to method arguments, either at call-site or within an invoked method.
      java.lang.Object[] getArgs(ArgumentProcessorMode mode)
      Returns an object array containing the method arguments.
      java.lang.Object getReceiver(ArgumentProcessorMode mode)
      Returns the receiver of the method invocation or null for static methods.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        void apply(java.lang.Class<?> argumentProcessorClass,
           ArgumentProcessorMode mode)
        Applies given argument processor to method arguments, either at call-site or within an invoked method.
        Parameters:
        argumentProcessorClass - argument processor class to apply
        mode - where to apply the argument processor.

      • getReceiver

        java.lang.Object getReceiver(ArgumentProcessorMode mode)
        Returns the receiver of the method invocation or null for static methods.
        Parameters:
        mode - for which should be the object retrieved

      • getArgs

        java.lang.Object[] getArgs(ArgumentProcessorMode mode)
        Returns an object array containing the method arguments. Note that primitive types will be boxed.
        Parameters:
        mode - for which should be the argument array retrieved
